verses.verse: וְאָ֣הַבְתָּ֔ <S%H157><s%> ve-'A-hav-ta, Therefore thou shalt love אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H8104><s%> ve-sha-mar-Ta and keep מִשְׁמַרְתּ֗וֹ <S%H4931><s%> mish-mar-To, his charge וְחֻקֹּתָ֧יו <S%H2708><s%> ve-chuk-ko-Tav and his statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֛יו <S%H4941><s%> u-mish-pa-Tav and his judgments וּמִצְוֹתָ֖יו <S%H4687><s%> u-mitz-vo-Tav and his commandments כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim. alway

וִֽידַעְתֶּם֮ <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem And know הַיּוֹם֒ <S%H3117><s%> hai-yOm ye this day כִּ֣י׀ <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for בְּנֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H1121><s%> be-nei-Chem, for [I speak] not with your children אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not יָדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'U which have not known וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not רָא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'U, and which have not seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מוּסַ֖ר <S%H4148><s%> mu-Sar the chastisement יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem; your God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גָּדְל֕וֹ <S%H1433><s%> ga-de-Lo his greatness אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do hand הַחֲזָקָ֔ה <S%H2389><s%> ha-cha-za-Kah, his mighty וּזְרֹע֖וֹ <S%H2220><s%> u-ze-ro-'O arm הַנְּטוּיָֽה׃ <S%H5186><s%> han-ne-tu-Yah. and his stretched out

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֹֽתֹתָיו֙ <S%H226><s%> 'o-to-Tav And his miracles וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מַעֲשָׂ֔יו <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sav, and his acts אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah which he did בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch in the midst מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt לְפַרְעֹ֥ה <S%H6547><s%> le-far-'Oh unto Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- the king מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-le-chol- all אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> ar-Tzo. and unto all his land

וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and what עָשָׂה֩ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah And what he did לְחֵ֨יל <S%H2428><s%> le-Cheil unto the army מִצְרַ֜יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt לְסוּסָ֣יו <S%H5483><s%> le-su-Sav unto their horses וּלְרִכְבּ֗וֹ <S%H7393><s%> u-le-rich-Bo, and to their chariots אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher when הֵצִ֜יף <S%H6687><s%> he-Tzif to overflow אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֵ֤י <S%H4325><s%> mei how he made the water יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> yam- sea סוּף֙ <S%H5488><s%> suf of the Red עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and פְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> pe-nei-Hem, them בְּרָדְפָ֖ם <S%H7291><s%> be-ra-de-Fam as they pursued אַחֲרֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Chem; after וַיְאַבְּדֵ֣ם <S%H6><s%> vay-'ab-be-Dem hath destroyed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, you and [how] the LORD עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad this הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom them unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. he

וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and what עָשָׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah And what he did לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar; unto you in the wilderness עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until בֹּאֲכֶ֖ם <S%H935><s%> bo-'a-Chem until ye came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom into this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. to this

וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and what עָשָׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah And what he did לְדָתָ֣ן <S%H1885><s%> le-da-Tan unto Dathan וְלַאֲבִירָ֗ם <S%H48><s%> ve-la-'a-vi-Ram, and Abiram בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons אֱלִיאָב֮ <S%H446><s%> 'e-li-'Av of Eliab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son רְאוּבֵן֒ <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven of Reuben אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher and what פָּצְתָ֤ה <S%H6475><s%> pa-tze-Tah opened הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz how the earth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פִּ֔יהָ <S%H6310><s%> Pi-ha, her mouth וַתִּבְלָעֵ֥ם <S%H1104><s%> vat-tiv-la-'Em and swallowed them up וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בָּתֵּיהֶ֖ם <S%H1004><s%> bat-tei-Hem and their households וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אָהֳלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H168><s%> 'o-ho-lei-Hem; and their tents וְאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and every הַיְקוּם֙ <S%H3351><s%> hay-Kum and all the substance אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher and what בְּרַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H7272><s%> be-rag-lei-Hem, that [was] in their possession בְּקֶ֖רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev in the midst כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of all Israel

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-nei-Chem But your eyes הָֽרֹאֹ֔ת <S%H7200><s%> ha-ro-'Ot, have seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh acts יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD הַגָּדֹ֑ל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol; all the great אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah. which he did

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֙ <S%H8104><s%> u-she-mar-Tem Therefore shall ye keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every הַמִּצְוָ֔ה <S%H4687><s%> ham-mitz-Vah, all the commandments אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-ve-Cha I command הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom; you this day לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an so תֶּחֶזְק֗וּ <S%H2388><s%> te-chez-Ku, that ye may be strong וּבָאתֶם֙ <S%H935><s%> u-va-Tem and go in וִֽירִשְׁתֶּ֣ם <S%H3423><s%> vi-rish-Tem and possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you עֹבְרִ֥ים <S%H5674><s%> 'oe-Rim whither ye go שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> le-rish-Tah. to possess

וּלְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> u-le-Ma-'an that תַּאֲרִ֤יכוּ <S%H748><s%> ta-'a-Ri-chu And that ye may prolong יָמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim [your] days עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah, in the land אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֨ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' sware יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-tei-Chem unto your fathers לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet to give לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem וּלְזַרְעָ֑ם <S%H2233><s%> u-le-zar-'Am; unto them and to their seed אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> za-Vat that floweth חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> cha-Lav with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> u-de-Vash. and honey ס sa-Mek

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki For הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, For the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you בָא־ <S%H935><s%> va- whither thou goest in שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah in it לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <S%H3423><s%> le-rish-Tah, to possess לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo like כְאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> che-'E-retz it [is] not as the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יְצָאתֶ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> ye-tza-Tem from whence ye came out מִשָּׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham; in it אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher where תִּזְרַע֙ <S%H2232><s%> tiz-Ra' where thou sowedst אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זַרְעֲךָ֔ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'a-Cha, thy seed וְהִשְׁקִ֥יתָ <S%H8248><s%> ve-hish-Ki-ta and wateredst בְרַגְלְךָ֖ <S%H7272><s%> ve-rag-le-Cha [it] with thy foot כְּגַ֥ן <S%H1588><s%> ke-Gan as a garden הַיָּרָֽק׃ <S%H3419><s%> hai-ya-Rak. of herbs

וְהָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ve-ha-'A-retz, But the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אַתֶּ֜ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you עֹבְרִ֥ים <S%H935><s%> 'oe-Rim abide שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah in it לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <S%H3423><s%> le-rish-Tah, to possess אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz it [is] a land הָרִ֖ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim of hills וּבְקָעֹ֑ת <S%H1237><s%> u-ve-ka-'Ot; and valleys לִמְטַ֥ר <S%H4306><s%> lim-Tar of the rain הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim of heaven תִּשְׁתֶּה־ <S%H8354><s%> tish-teh- [and] drinketh מָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim. water

אֶ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz A land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God דֹּרֵ֣שׁ <S%H1875><s%> do-Resh careth for אֹתָ֑הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah; תָּמִ֗יד <S%H8548><s%> ta-Mid, [are] always עֵינֵ֨י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei the eyes יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בָּ֔הּ Bah, מֵֽרֵשִׁית֙ <S%H7225><s%> me-re-Shit upon it from the beginning הַשָּׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> hash-sha-Nah, of the year וְעַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> ve-'Ad even אַחֲרִ֥ית <S%H319><s%> 'a-cha-Rit even unto the end שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah. of the year ס sa-Mek

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah, shall come אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if שָׁמֹ֤עַ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Mo-a' And it shall come to pass if ye shall hearken תִּשְׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> tish-me-'U diligently אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מִצְוֹתַ֔י <S%H4687><s%> mitz-vo-Tai, unto my commandments אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוֶּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-Veh which I command אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom; you this day לְאַהֲבָ֞ה <S%H157><s%> le-'a-ha-Vah to love אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God וּלְעָבְד֔וֹ <S%H5647><s%> u-le-'a-ve-Do, and to serve בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <S%H3824><s%> le-vav-Chem him with all your heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol and all נַפְשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-she-Chem. and with all your soul

וְנָתַתִּ֧י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti That I will give מְטַֽר־ <S%H4306><s%> me-tar- [you] the rain אַרְצְכֶ֛ם <S%H776><s%> 'ar-tze-Chem of your land בְּעִתּ֖וֹ <S%H6256><s%> be-'it-To in his due season יוֹרֶ֣ה <S%H3138><s%> yo-Reh the first rain וּמַלְק֑וֹשׁ <S%H4456><s%> u-mal-Koosh; and the latter rain וְאָסַפְתָּ֣ <S%H622><s%> ve-'a-saf-Ta that thou mayest gather דְגָנֶ֔ךָ <S%H1715><s%> de-ga-Ne-cha, in thy corn וְתִֽירֹשְׁךָ֖ <S%H8492><s%> ve-ti-ro-she-Cha and thy wine וְיִצְהָרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3323><s%> ve-yitz-ha-Re-cha. and thine oil
